infos.value: The Barracks are yours to use freely, whether you wish to further enhance your best units or strengthen others in preparation for future encounters.
Just be sure to utilize them frequently.

• Barracks •
Units that are placed in the Barracks acquire JP periodically; their Bravery and Faith will shift as well.

• Using the Barracks •
Provisions are necessary to use the Barracks. You can purchase provisions via the Replenish Provisions menu.

• Replenishing Provisions •
Here you can replenish, purchase, and expand your provisions.

• Effects of Provisions •
There are provisions of different rarities. More JP can be acquired by using higher rarity provisions.
